title:
Here is a great update from one of our adopters.

"When you let us bring her home, as you know, she ...

attachments.displayName:
Here is a great update from one of our adopters.

"When you let us bring her home, as you know, she was a bit bald and sad looking, but we loved her at first sight! After nearly 10 months of vet care and complete vigilance on our part to continue her mange treatment, she has a completely clear bill of health! She weighs a healthy 53 pounds. She has been clear for a month now, her hair is growing in quite beautifully, Thank you so much Alley for doing what you do, for trusting us to take care of this sweet girl that you found. We love and adore her. She has brought so much joy to our lives.
Dan and Kristi Sexton"

object.content:
Here is a great update from one of our adopters.

"When you let us bring her home, as you know, she was a bit bald and sad looking, but we loved her at first sight! After nearly 10 months of vet care and complete vigilance on our part to continue her mange treatment, she has a completely clear bill of health! She weighs a healthy 53 pounds. She has been clear for a month now, her hair is growing in quite beautifully, Thank you so much Alley for doing what you do, for trusting us to take care of this sweet girl that you found. We love and adore her. She has brought so much joy to our lives.
 Dan and Kristi Sexton"

actor.displayName: Alleys Rescued Angels, Siberian Husky Rescue, LA

object.content: Aww. My 17 year old husky is named Timber. So glad that baby has a good home! (tears of joy)
